description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Play online with your avatar and immerse yourself in ridiculously awesome jet pack combat! Choose between 4 unique 3D worlds where you will get to blast your friends with your energy rocket launcher and compete over power-ups all while soaring through the air and climbing the ranks on the global high scores list. Featuring 6 mind blistering jet pack songs provided by The Song Club.
